name: Neo-Medieval Folk
description: Emulates European Folk Music from the Middle Ages, originating in Germany in the 1980s.

children.name: Bardcore
children.description: Rearranges contemporary music with an array of acoustic instrumentation to evoke the aesthetic of medieval Europe.
